summary: This folder implements the command-line interface (CLI) for the WarpData ecosystem, providing a suite of tools for dataset lifecycle management. It enables users to register, ingest, sync, and inspect large-scale datasets with a focus on S3-backed storage and local caching.
responsibilities: Orchestrating dataset ingestion from CSV, ImageNet-style folders, and paired data sources.
Managing local and remote manifest synchronization with S3/B2 buckets.
Providing diagnostic tools (doctor) to verify environment connectivity and data integrity.
Generating optimized Python loader scripts for specific dataset versions.
Handling cache maintenance including garbage collection and status reporting.
Facilitating the publication of local datasets to remote content-addressed storage.
Inspecting dataset schemas, metadata, and artifact bindings.
